name: Ways of History
description: Hardcore real-time strategy with a long-term round. Development of your civilization from caves to space. Huge world. Thousands of players. 240+ sciences and technologies. About 100 troops. 4 races. 50+ resource deposits. War, trade, science, construction...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 300 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.x support DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 300 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.x support DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1300 MB available space
